I.6. Waste disposal is efficiently
and effectively managed.

The campus is implementing the
CvSU 5s Good Housekeeping
Project

The campus is implementing the
Garbage in-Garbage out Policy

The campus prohibits the use of
Single Use Plastics.

There is a recyclable metal box
within the vicinity

BS Office Administration
C. MAINTENANCE
OUTCOME/S
O.1. The laboratories and shops
are functional and properly
maintained.

BS Office Administration
C. MAINTENANCE
BEST PRACTICES
The laboratory technician maintains the
orderliness of laboratories and the
quality of the equipment.

BS Office Administration
C. MAINTENANCE
Visual monitoring is always conducted
to find and replace the tools especially
the glassware that are no longer
sufficient for use.
The laboratory technician always
performs trouble shooting when the
equipment malfunctions. A test run is
conducted when the equipment will be
used.

BS Office Administration
C. MAINTENANCE
The laboratory management requests
from the suppliers and other external
institution for the periodic calibration
and cleaning of high-end laboratory
equipment and tools.
Electrical window maintenance, roof
and repair, installation of equipment,
maintenance services are water and
other supply repair rendered by the
Physical Plant Services office of the
University.

BS Office Administration
C. MAINTENANCE
The cleanliness of the laboratory rooms
is maintained by the utility personnel
every day.
The students were tasked for
maintaining the cleanliness of their
working area during their classes.
Waste within segregation is observed
the facilities of the department. Labeled
trash bins of solid are used for disposal
of the wastes.
